name: The Strayed
description: The Strayed is a classic old school side scrolling platformer with an original storyline, containing over 30 levels. This game is still in early access. Main hero is a young guy wandering around the strange island in search of his beloved, who disappeared after the crash of an aircraft on which they flew on vacation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8 gHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.8 gHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
